entry.title: Hamas Sets Free Two More Hostages but Talks Held Up Over Release of Larger Group
entry.content: Hamas released two more civilian hostages, but negotiations over a possible release of a group of 50 captives stumbled over the militant groupâ€™s demand that Israel allow fuel deliveries into Gaza, according to officials familiar with the talks.

entry.title: Israel Steps Up Gaza Bombing as Biden Urges It to Protect Civilians
entry.content: Israel struck more than 300 targets in the enclave over the past day, as President Biden and other Western leaders expressed support for Israel while urging it to protect civilians, and Hamas freed two more hostages amid talks on a broader deal.

entry.title: Israeli Military Shows Video Evidence of Oct. 7 Attacks, Some Taken From Militants' Body Cams
entry.content: The compilation of footage is part of government effort to document the scope and severity of the Hamas assault.
